DialogueOption.Text: I hear you are familiar with Landon Ortega.
Do you own the local garage?

DialogueNode.Text: Yeah I've known his for a few years now. What do you need to know?

DialogueOption.Text: Have you ever had any issues with Landon?
Do you enjoy working with Landon?

DialogueNode.Text: Yes I work there with my apprentice Landon.

DialogueOption.Text: Have you ever had any issues with Landon?
Do you enjoy working with Landon?

DialogueNode.Text: Well, he's a reliable worker but there was one repair we had trouble on.

DialogueOption.Text: That's unfortunate, I had high hopes for him.

DialogueNode.Text: Landon is a very pleasant and enthusiastic worker to be around. He is always looking for new ways to solve issues customers bring in that are better than the way I already do things.

DialogueOption.Text: So you would vouch for his good nature?
I guess you would be sad to see him go then?

DialogueNode.Text: Landon went off the books and gave the customer an advanced custom distributer he had made for their new car which he hoped to improve efficiency.

DialogueOption.Text: I guess it's safe to assume it didn't work as intended.

DialogueNode.Text: Well I wouldn't hold it against him, he had good intentions.
His custome design managed to completely ruin the customer's engine due to a minor miscalculation he made within his design. The customer was severely injured.
Definitely, he's a great individual that I'd hope to see achieve great things.
Ah, so he signed up to go to Evandria did he? Well it's be worth letting him go if he was making great strides for humanity.

Dialogue.clue: Landon is an innovative designer, but with ambition designs come great risks. Hopefully it was a one time mistake that he learned from?
